scripts.build-dev-with-mocks: babel src -d dist & babel test -d dist
scripts.start-dev-with-mocks: node dist/dummy-oidc-provider.js & node dist/dummy-api.js & node -r dotenv/config dist/startup.js dotenv_config_path=test/test.env
scripts.start-dev-with-mocks-win: start node dist/dummy-oidc-provider.js && start node dist/dummy-api.js && node -r dotenv/config dist/startup.js dotenv_config_path=test/test.env
